name: Junchen Jiang
content: Junchen Jiang Junchen Jiang Welcome! I'm an Associate Professor at the Dept. of Computer Science at the University of Chicago, which I joined in July 2018. I'm currently on entrepreneurship leave. I received my B.A. in computer science from Tsinghua University (Yao Class). I received my PhD in computer science from Carnegie Mellon University in 2017 where I received the CMU SCS Doctoral Dissertation Award. I was advised by Vyas Sekar and Hui Zhang. Research interests: networked systems and machine learning systems. [Curriculum Vitae] If you are UChicago student (undergrad or grad) and interested in internship opportunities in my group, feel free to drop me an email with your CV. Recent Project LMCache: Long-Context LLM Serving by Sharing Knowledge (KV Cache) LMCache Project is open-source. Check it out! Technical reports: CacheGen(SIGCOMM'24) and CacheBlend(EuroSys'25 Best Paper). Articles: UChicago News. Talk: Talk at ML/AI Infra Meetup Professional Activities AI+Systems Seminar at UChicago Program Committee: SIGCOMM (2023, 2020, 2019), NSDI (2026, 2025, 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021), OSDI (2024), EuroSys (2024), HotNets (2022, 2021), CoNEXT (2024, 2023, 2021, 2020, 2019, 2018), ATC (2020, 2018), HotCloud (2018), APNet (2021, 2019, 2018), MMSys (2019, 2018) Organizing Committee: MobiCom 2021 HotEdgeVideo Workshop, SIGCOMM 2019 NetAI Workshop, Area Chair (Networking) JSys Awards Google ML and Systems Junior Faculty Award, 2025 ACM EuroSys, Best Paper, 2025 NSF CAREER, 2022 ACM/IEEE Symposium on Edge Computing (SEC), Best Paper Runner-up, 2021 ACM/IEEE Symposium on Edge Computing (SEC), Best Paper, 2020 Google Faculty Research Award, 2019 CMU SCS Doctoral Dissertation Award, 2017 Nominated for ACM Doctoral Dissertation Award by CMU Team PhD Students Xu Zhang (Harper Dissertation Fellowship) on Internet QoE --> Conviva Inc. --> Meta Kuntai Du (Siebel Scholar) on video analytics Zhengxu Xia Yihua Cheng Yuhan Liu (with Shan Lu) Siddhant Ray (with Nick Feamster) Jiayi Yao (with Shan Lu) Hussain Ahmad Mohammad (with Nick Feamster) PhD Thesis Enabling Data-Driven Optimization of Quality of Experience in Internet Applications, Carnegie Mellon University, July 2017 Winner of the CMU SCS Doctoral Dissertation Award and Nomination for ACM Dissertation Award. Recent Publications Yuhan Liu, Yuyang Huang, Jiayi Yao, Zhuohan Gu, Kuntai Du, Hanchen Li, Yihua Cheng, Junchen Jiang, Shan Lu, Madan Musuvathi, Esha Choukse.
